nodes.explanation: comparisons indicating something has reached a peak or is at an all-time high
comparisons indicating an increase or enhancement compared to previous levels
phrases indicating comparatives, specifically mentioning something as more than ever before
comparisons or contrasts emphasizing a heightened or exceptional level of something
comparisons of how things are at present to how they were in the past
comparisons related to an increase or improvement over time
instances of the phrase "than ever" in the context of things increasing or improving over time
